resources.description: This data provides district-wise financial progress as on date under Nirmal Bharat Abhiyan (NBA) Programme of Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation. This is a XML feed to provide up-to-date financial progress of NBA Programme.
resources.name: Nirmal Bharat Abhiyan - District-wise Financial Progress As On Date
